TopicTitle: Where did all the fuel tanks go (1.0)?

Articles.Content: I seem to be missing all the big tanks.
For a second i thought they forgot the NASA parts. But they integrated them with the other parts in the Squad folder.

Yes, the folders were all combined. Also, the tech nodes were jumbled up a bit, so they might not be in the same places you are used to looking (if in career mode).

Cheers,

~Claw
